pullRequest.title: [amazonechocontrol] improvements and bug fixes
pullRequest.bodyText:
improvements to queue handling
remove StringUtils (see #7722)
fix (nearly) all warning (what stays are limitations of the null-checker and false positives)
fix smarthome devices not updating state
fix color channel command for smarthome devices

Also-By: Tom Blum trinitus01@googlemail.com
Signed-Off-By: Jan N. Klug jan.n.klug@rub.de

commit.message:
fixed: InterrupedException

Signed-off-by: Tom Blum trinitus01@googlemail.com

changed: single and group queues to device queue
added: standard volume to speak request

Signed-off-by: Tom Blum trinitus01@googlemail.com

changed: log from info to debug

Signed-off-by: Tom Blum trinitus01@googlemail.com

nodes.bodyText: Judging from how you are using this, please change devicesRunning to a Lock and use tryLock instead.
Could this be implemented using CompletableFuture instead?
